member.name: T:SatelliteMenu.SatelliteMenuButton

member.summary: Gets or sets the degree between the first and the last item.

member.name: M:SatelliteMenu.SatelliteMenuButton.GetDegrees(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Default provider for degrees between items. For number of items up to 3 tries to keep items centered in the given total degrees. For number equal and bigger than four, distirbutes evenly using min and max degrees.
